main event: A round object, size of a dime, reddish with a trailing reddish-orange tail, was observed falling in a NW direction at Westover AFB.
interesting points: The observation lasted for one minute,The object was described by both civilian and military sources,The sighting fits the characteristics of a fireball, The object disappeared into overcast clouds after a straight drop, A SAC pilot was involved in the observation.
sighted object: a round object with a reddish color and a reddish-orange tail
